game_description: MultiBrush is a multiplayer implementation of the open source code for Tilt Brush. Now you can play, create, and enjoy art - with friends! This is a first release, some things may not work perfectly and we are still implementing some tools in the multiplayer rooms. In individual canvases, the full set of tools is available to you. Stay tuned for more! This was made with love by the team at Rendever. Give us a shout! Twitter: @RendeverHealth Instagram: @rendever.health
review_2: Great game if you're into making 3D art, but not my cup of tea. Slick interface, lots of fun stuff to do, and you can chill out with friends working on a scene! Don't bother getting Tilt Brush, because (at least last I checked) this is more advanced and has multiplayer.
review_3: It’s a really great program, easy to create in. The problem lies in not being able to retrieve images in clarity, via casting. Also, the inability to smoothly move around during captures, is kind of off putting. If you like to doodle around and not share, it’s a perfect app.
review_4: This would be recommendation for any art style game I've played.i revisit frequently. Well worth the price.
review_5: I love this app, all the choices for brushes make painting more enjoyable. I'm wondering though, how can I record video? I don't see any options in the app nor online yet I've seen uTube video's showing it's possible.
